QuestData.Title: Thornar Thunderclash
QuestData.Description: We've been trying to take out the commander of the Wildhammer encroaching on our lands, but we've had no luck.$B$BThornar Thunderclash sits in the safety of his command post, his voice booming across the battlefield to rally the dwarves. We're thinking he needs to be quieted.$B$BCut Thornar down and we can clean up the rest of this skirmish with no problem.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Our troops stand a much better chance once this oaf is dead on the ground.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm not as old as I look, $r... I can still hear that dwarf from here.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, mon. A fine hero of the Horde you are.
